effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.x_y: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.
